Lecture #1 Done:

HELLO KITTY

Rules!

  • Don`t use Russian Google Requests (also Translator).Short request is nice!
  • It is desirable to use the console commands
  • Сorrect grammatical errors

Coming soon!

Lesson №1

Setup

Create/Use GitHub account Need to be installed: VSCode , Git , NodeJS
*Additional you can install some recommended extension for VSCode
  • Create folder(your workspace);
  • Open that folder in VSCode
  • Run the following commands using VSCode build-in terminal [SHIFT] + CTRL + ~
  • Clone this repository
  • Go there cd ./hello_kitty
  • Install dependeces package npm install
  • Run npm command npm run dev
  • Give answer on question : Who my kitty?

*Next time you open folder of repository *Work in terminal always look your current dir *

Commands:

  • cd *path* - go to directory
  • pwd - show your current dir
  • ls - list of files in dir

Lecture

As you can see we:
  • Create workspace
  • Clone there your repository
    • install dependences;
    • run first webserver;
    • give answer on question

Kewords

node npm dependeces terminal/cmd git VSCode
